title: Drawing, "Sketches.  Landscapes.", July 1844
inscribed:
Recto: Inscribed in black crayon ?, at various locations : reddish and grey rock / moss in patches / water dripping;  birch;  hemlock; and again, at top right: MOSES ROCK / Mountain House / [ and the date].  

Verso: Inscribed in black crayon ? with figures; at top:  2 brilliant yellow light - shadows warm and greenish top ('all' struck out) lighted / 3 upper cloud - very dark blue - and here and there a ....... (?) place showing the sky of a lighter and more exquisite blue / darkish and yellowish smoky color / 5 darker ragged cloud (thundery appearance) / facing the south; and near the centre of the right edge:  west.
description:
Recto: Horizontal view of a group of trees.  
Verso: Sky with clouds over a mountain ridge, with an arrow near the center of the right edge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketches.  Landscapes.", July 1844.
July 1844. Black crayon on paper.. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-26.
